mapper.sql: id, invest_id, corpus, default_interest, expected_interest, actual_interest, expected_fee, actual_fee, repay_amount, period, repay_date, actual_repay_date, status, is_transferred, created_time, updated_time
mapper.select: select from invest_repay where id = #{id}
select from invest_repay where invest_id = #{investId} order by period asc
select * from invest_repay where invest_id = #{investId} and period = #{period}
select * from invest_repay where invest_id = #{investId} and period < #{period}
select * from invest_repay where invest_id = #{investId} and period = #{period} and status = 'COMPLETE'
mapper.update: update invest_repay set corpus = #{corpus}, expected_interest = #{expectedInterest}, expected_fee = #{expectedFee}, repay_date = #{repayDate}, actual_interest = #{actualInterest}, actual_fee = #{actualFee}, actual_repay_date = #{actualRepayDate}, default_interest = #{defaultInterest}, is_transferred = #{isTransferred}, repay_amount = #{repayAmount}, status = #{status}, updated_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM( ir.`corpus` + ir.`actual_interest` + ir.`default_interest` - ir.`actual_fee` ),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN (SELECT i.`id` AS investId, l.`name` AS loanName, l.`activity_rate`, l.`base_rate`, l.`periods` FROM invest i JOIN loan l ON i.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` IN ('COMPLETE', 'REPAYING') WHERE i.`login_name` = #{loginName}) t ON ir.`invest_id` = t.investId WHERE ir.`status` = 'COMPLETE' AND ir.`actual_repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( ir.`corpus` + ir.`expected_interest` + ir.`default_interest` - ir.`expected_fee` ),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN (SELECT i.`id` AS investId, l.`name` AS loanName, l.`activity_rate`, l.`base_rate`, l.`periods` FROM invest i JOIN loan l ON i.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` IN ('COMPLETE', 'REPAYING') WHERE i.`login_name` = #{loginName}) t ON ir.`invest_id` = t.investId WHERE ir.`status` != 'COMPLETE' AND ir.`repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT ir.*, t.loanName AS `name`, t.activity_rate, t.base_rate, t.periods, t.duration, t.`loan_id`, t.type, t.product_type FROM invest_repay ir JOIN (SELECT i.`id` AS investId, l.`name` AS loanName, l.`activity_rate`, l.`base_rate`, l.`periods`, l.`duration`, l.`id` as loan_id, l.`type`, l.product_type FROM invest i JOIN loan l ON i.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` IN ('COMPLETE', 'REPAYING') or (l.product_type='EXPERIENCE' and TO_DAYS(now()) - TO_DAYS(invest_time) > l.duration) WHERE i.`login_name` = #{loginName} and i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' ) t ON ir.`invest_id` = t.investId WHERE ir.`status` = 'COMPLETE' AND ir.`actual_repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY ir.`actual_repay_date` DESC LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}

SELECT ir.*, t.loanName AS `name`, t.activity_rate, t.base_rate, t.periods, t.duration, t.`loan_id`, t.type, t.product_type FROM invest_repay ir JOIN (SELECT i.`id` AS investId, l.`name` AS loanName, l.`activity_rate`, l.`base_rate`, l.`periods`, l.`duration`, l.`id` as `loan_id`, l.type, l.product_type FROM invest i JOIN loan l ON i.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` IN ('COMPLETE', 'REPAYING') or (l.product_type='EXPERIENCE' and TO_DAYS(now()) - TO_DAYS(invest_time) <= l.duration) WHERE i.`login_name` = #{loginName} and i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' ) t ON ir.`invest_id` = t.investId WHERE ir.`status` != 'COMPLETE' AND ir.`repay_date` BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY ir.`repay_date` LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}

SELECT temp.`created_time`, temp.`name` AS loanName, temp.loanId AS loanId, temp.id AS investId, temp2.`repay_date`, temp2.`corpus`, temp2.`expected_interest`, temp2.`default_interest`, temp2.`expected_fee`, temp.`amount`, temp2.`status`, product_type FROM (SELECT i.`id`, i.`created_time`, i.`amount`, l.`name`, l.`id` AS loanId, l.product_type FROM invest i JOIN loan l ON i.`loan_id` = l.`id` AND l.`status` != 'WAITING_VERIFY' WHERE i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND i.`login_name` = #{loginName}) temp LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.`invest_id`, t.`corpus`, t.`expected_interest`, t.`default_interest`, t.`expected_fee`, t.`repay_date`, t.`status` FROM invest_repay t JOIN (SELECT ir.`invest_id`, MIN(ir.`repay_date`) AS `repay_date` FROM invest_repay ir WHERE ir.`status` != 'COMPLETE' GROUP BY ir.`invest_id`) m ON t.`invest_id` = m.`invest_id` AND t.`repay_date` = m.`repay_date` AND t.`status` != 'COMPLETE') temp2 ON temp.`id` = temp2.`invest_id` ORDER BY temp.`created_time` DESC LIMIT #{startLimit}, #{endLimit}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( ir.`actual_interest` + ir.`default_interest` - ir.`actual_fee` ),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN invest i ON ir.`invest_id` = i.`id` AND i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND i.`login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE ir.`status` = 'COMPLETE' and loan_id != 1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( ir.`expected_interest` + ir.`default_interest` - ir.`expected_fee` ),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN invest i ON ir.`invest_id` = i.`id` AND i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND i.`login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE ir.`status` IN ('REPAYING', 'OVERDUE') and i.loan_id != 1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ir.`corpus`),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN invest i ON ir.`invest_id` = i.`id` AND i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND i.`login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE ir.`status` IN ('REPAYING', 'OVERDUE') and i.loan_id != 1
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ir.`corpus`),0) FROM invest_repay ir JOIN invest i ON ir.`invest_id` = i.`id` AND i.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND i.`login_name` = #{loginName} WHERE ir.`status` = 'COMPLETE'
SELECT ir.* FROM invest_repay ir JOIN invest i ON ir.`invest_id` = i.`id` AND i.`loan_id` = #{loanId} WHERE ir.`period` = #{period} AND ir.`status` != 'COMPLETE'
select * from invest_repay inner join invest on invest_repay.invest_id = invest.id inner join loan on loan.id = invest.loan_id where loan.id = #{loanId}
select count(1) from invest_repay where invest_id = #{transferInvestId} and period >= #{period}
